posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I have the following tougher T207s for sale:

Otto Miller, Dodgers
PSA3 - glowing Cycle back   $625

Bauman, Tigers 
(trimmed, poor) - one of the 10 toughest in the set -  SOLD
VCP shows only 4 sales in any grade since 2013

Gregg, Indians, SGC 2.5
Looks nicer in person than in the scan   $200


email me at [url]apspr@att.net[/url] 

Shipping is on me.  Paypal F/F - otherwise please add 3%.

Thanks, 
Tim

Nice cards, Tim - best of luck with the sale.  I could use some of those, if only the backs were switched around a little. 

--
Mike

posts.post_title: Bumping and price reduction for the two remaining ones left
